options.systemMessage:
=You are MEDO, a personal assistant for the GANDAS platform who helps users manage and analyze their documents.

  {{ $('Prepare Agent Input').item.json.isFirstMessage ? 'This is the user\'s first interaction. Be welcoming and explain your capabilities briefly.' : '' }}

  Here is some additional information known about the user:
  {{ ($('Merge Zep Context').item?.json?.facts || []).join("\n") }}

  Here are the 5 most recent interactions:
  {{ ($('Merge Zep Context').item?.json?.conversations || []).join("\n\n") }}

  Available capabilities:
  - Analyze uploaded documents (PDF, Word, Excel, etc.)
  - Answer questions based on document content
  - Help organize and search through information
  - Provide summaries and insights

parameters.toolDescription: Use this tool to fetch all available documents stored in Firebase Storage via GANDAS platform...
Given a Firebase file ID, fetches the text from the document stored in GANDAS.
parameters.query: SELECT string_agg(content, ' ') as document_text FROM documents WHERE metadata->>'file_id' = $1 GROUP BY metadata->>'file_id';

parameters.toolDescription: Run a SQL query on documents stored via Firebase Storage in GANDAS...
Use RAG to look up information from documents stored in Firebase Storage...

parameters.query:
SELECT message, role, created_at FROM conversations
    WHERE user_id = get_user_id_from_telegram($1)
    ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT fact FROM user_facts WHERE user_id = get_user_id_from_telegram($1) ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 5

INSERT INTO conversations (user_id, message, response, role)
    VALUES (
      get_user_id_from_telegram($1),
      $2,
      $3,
      'human'
    )

options.queryReplacement: = {{ $('Unified Bot Webhook').item.json.body.message.from.id }}, {{ JSON.stringify($('Prepare Agent Input').item.json.chatInput || 'Message vide') }}, {{ JSON.stringify($('RAG AI Agent').item.json.output) }}

parameters.query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as message_count,
           CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END as is_first_time
    FROM conversations
    WHERE user_id = get_user_id_from_telegram($1)
INSERT INTO telegram_messages (telegram_id, role, content) VALUES ($1, 'user', $2)

options.queryReplacement: ={{ $('Unified Bot Webhook').item.json.body.message.from.id }} {{ JSON.stringify($('Prepare Agent Input').item.json.chatInput || 'Message vide') }}

parameters.query:
SELECT
    role,
    COUNT(*) as count,
    MAX(created_at) as last_registration
  FROM telegram_users
  GROUP BY role
  ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT
    u.auth_user_id,
    inter.can_process as is_subscribed,
    inter.can_process as can_upload,
    inter.remaining_free_interactions,
    inter.requires_subscription,
    u.subscription_status,
    u.firebase_storage_quota_mb as quota_mb,
    u.firebase_storage_used_mb as used_mb,
    (u.firebase_storage_quota_mb - COALESCE(u.firebase_storage_used_mb, 0)) as remaining_mb
  FROM users u
  JOIN user_channels uc ON u.id = uc.user_id
  CROSS JOIN LATERAL check_and_increment_interaction(u.telegram_id) inter
  WHERE uc.channel_type = 'telegram'
  AND uc.channel_id = CAST({{ $json.telegram_user_id || $json.user_id }} AS TEXT)

SELECT
    u.auth_user_id,
    inter.can_process as is_subscribed,
    inter.can_process as can_upload,
    inter.remaining_free_interactions,
    inter.requires_subscription,
    u.subscription_status,
    u.firebase_storage_quota_mb as quota_mb,
    u.firebase_storage_used_mb as used_mb,
    (u.firebase_storage_quota_mb - COALESCE(u.firebase_storage_used_mb, 0)) as remaining_mb
  FROM users u
  JOIN user_channels uc ON u.id = uc.user_id
  CROSS JOIN LATERAL check_and_increment_interaction(u.telegram_id) inter
  WHERE uc.channel_type = 'telegram'
  AND uc.channel_id = CAST({{ $json.message.from.id }} AS TEXT)
